QUOTE_1: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
QUOTE_2: Children are not things to be molded, but are people to be unfolded.
QUOTE_3: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
QUOTE_4: Children learn more from what you are than what you teach.
QUOTE_5: Play is the highest form of research.
QUOTE_6: Children are the world's most valuable resource and its best hope for the future.
QUOTE_7: Every child deserves a champion - an adult who will never give up on them.
QUOTE_8: The best way to make children good is to make them happy.
QUOTE_9: Children are like wet cement. Whatever falls on them makes an impression.
QUOTE_10: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world.
